page.title: 01THE ABERFELDY AREA
page.content: Traditionally,Aberfeldy has been the { {market town}for the river valleys of the{Tay}and{Tummel.}The town's location has made it the perfect centre for{tourism}-related services emerging as dominant employers.Local employment reflects a rural community supported by{tourism,agriculture and {forestry. Major employers are{Breadalbane {Academy,a Textile mill,a Laundry and {a Distillery. There are many clubs and societies reflecting indoor and outdoor pursuits throughout the year. Annual events include the famous{ {Kenmore to Aberfeldy Raft Race,Gala {Week,local Gaelic Mod and the {traditional Christmas show}performed by our talented amateur{Dramatic Club.
